title: Bifurcation in a bouncing universe
authors: M. Novello and A. G. Cesar
abstract:
We analyze the presence of a bifurcation in a spatially homogeneous and
isotropic bouncing universe generated by viscous processes. The analysis of the
phase diagrams of the dynamics of General Relativity show the presence of
bifurcations on the model and particularly the presence of bifurcations on
bouncing equilibrium points.
